name: Mango Margarita Slush
preparation: Slice lime in half. Using 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze juice into a blender. Add mango, coconut water, tequila, and mix. Blend until smooth. Add ice cubes, 5 at a time, until a slushy texture is achieved.
Pour into glasses. Add garnish, if desired, and serve.
tips: Rub a lime wedge around the edge of each glass; dip rim on plate with salt, until covered. Pour margarita into each glass, garnish, and serve.
